subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Demon Deacons now have the best overall record of any team in the A.C.C. and are tied with Maryland at 5-1 in conference play after holding off a Boston College rally on Saturday night.
snippet: The Demon Deacons now have the best overall record of any team in the A.C.C. and are tied with Maryland at 5-1 in conference play after holding off a Boston College rally on Saturday night.
